document.full_text: the united states lost to switzerland 5-3 monday at hockey's world championship, a defeat that leaves the americans facing defending champion czech republic in the quarterfinals.
document.title: u.s. loses to switzerland 5-3 at hockey worlds
lines_and_colors: the united states lost to switzerland 5-3 monday at hockey's world championship, a defeat that leaves the americans facing defending champion czech republic in the quarterfinals.
